comment: The chillest prof I have ever had. No tests. Lets you turn in work late, because she knows that college can be stressful. TAKE HER
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I loved Ms. Sinton! Responds fast to emails and is always happy to help I often sent her my work to review and she provided me with feedback. There is about 4 major assignments and a group project but they were easy! She also provided an example on the projects which helped. Group project was not my favorite assignment but work ahead!
If you need to take any TCOM classes, professor Sinton is the BOP! She's absolutely the best professor i've ever had at Kennesaw, don't just think about taking her.. RUN!

Professor Sinton is one of the best professors I have had. She responds to emails on time. She gives you good feedback and isn't rude when telling you what could have been done better. The assignments are not that difficult. If you can, take her for TCOM. It's an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Awesome professor! Very clear and concise about what is expected of you. A lot of reading, group work and discussions. Very prompt when responding to emails and she leaves great feedback on all assignments. If you do all your work, you should surely get an A. I would DEFINITELY take her again. Truly a gem.

Professor Sinton made this course very straight forward and a breeze to complete. She is very easy to reach outside of class and gives feedback on almost all assignments. There are several group projects, but they are painless. Overall solid course that's honestly the most practical class I've taken so far.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects
